title: Laggy Client
body: I just downloaded and upgraded to the new client and its constantly been laggy and slow to react. Just wondering if this is a problem that can be fixed.

replies.body: That sounds odd to hear, so I'm not really sure what you mean by laggy and slow.  How is it if you return to the client?  Ir could just be messed up files, or even pc hardware.  Any specifics could help a lot, and I recommend reporting it over at the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards for review.

There have been several other threads relating to this issue you should probably check them out, your guys' new client is super laggy in draft champion select, laggy even so much as people are missing bans and picks in champ select. Changing masteries in champ select is nigh impossible due to the delay associated with trying to change them. Please check out these threads, seriously we need your insight.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/fTzyTY7W-beta-client-too-laggy
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/TeHMLfxc-is-the-beta-client-super-laggy-or-is-it-just-me
